column1: Smoque BBQ////Good BBQ and really great sides. We came on a weekend around 2 pm and we were seated as soon as we ordered. We got a full rack of ribs
column4: and baked beans. The Mac n Cheese and baked beans were fantastic. Some of the best sides I've had in a long time. I do wish they had a wider range of BBQ sauces available in larger containers at each table rather than a small to-go style sauce container.
